conference: International Conference on Management of Data
notes: Authors can optionally submit data for ACM's 'Reproducibile Label'. Therew were two rounds of submissions. There were 7 single-author submissions, all rejected. One author submitted 13 papers. Typical review load: 9-10 papers. Most papers had 3 reviews, 9 had 5 reviews. Average review length was 3,000 chars.
pc_members: Yi Chen (New Jersey Institute of Technology, USA)
Benny Kimelfeld (Technion - Israel Institute of Technology, Israel)
Ioana Manolescu (INRIA Saclay and Ecole Polytechnique, France)
Aditya Parameswaran (University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, USA)
